title: Hydration is Key
desc: Pets can dehydrate even in cold weather. Always keep their water bowl clean and full.

title: Protect Their Paws
desc: Use pet-safe paw balm to prevent cracks and irritation from snow or rough surfaces.

title: Warm Shelter
desc: Ensure your pet has a cozy indoor space away from cold drafts and chilly air.

title: Winter Diet Boost
desc: Provide extra nutrients and calories to help pets maintain warmth and energy.

title: Use Pet Blankets
desc: Wrap your pet in soft fleece or thermal blankets for added comfort during cold nights.

title: Limit Outdoor Time
desc: Keep outdoor walks short to protect pets from frostbite and freezing temperatures.
